ui.title: Persona-Driven PDF Analysis System
ui.subtitle: Intelligent document analysis tailored to your role and objectives
ui.persona_placeholder: e.g., HR Professional, Student, Data Analyst
ui.job_placeholder: e.g., Create fillable forms for employee onboarding
ui.upload_help: Select one or more PDF files to analyze (max 50MB each)

jobs.hr_professional: Create and manage fillable forms for employee onboarding
jobs.student: Extract key concepts and study materials for exam preparation
jobs.data_analyst: Identify trends and extract actionable business insights
jobs.project_manager: Track project milestones and resource allocation
jobs.researcher: Gather evidence and citations for academic research
jobs.consultant: Develop strategic recommendations for client presentations

errors.no_files: Please select at least one PDF file to analyze.
errors.no_persona: Please specify your persona or role.
errors.file_too_large: File size exceeds the maximum limit of 50MB.
errors.invalid_file: Please upload valid PDF files only.
